name: Escape into the Abyss
description:
Six anonymous miners are escaping from a dark force that comes from the sky, mining underground with their picaxe.

With your mouse, select 4 different types of ways to destroy the ground to help miners to go deeper and deeper. 

Keep all of them alive as long as possible.

Made for Ludum Dare 48

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/48/escape-into-the-abyss
